title: Storm Form (spell)
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| [![Storm form.png](/images/b/b8/Storm_form.png)](/File:Storm_form.png) Storm Form |                                                                                                                   |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                             | 7                                                                                                                 |
| School1                                                                           | [Air](/Air_Magic "Air Magic")                                                                                     |
| School2                                                                           | [Transmutation](/Transmutations "Transmutations")                                                                 |
| Source(s)                                                                         | [Inescapable Atlas](/Inescapable_Atlas "Inescapable Atlas") [Book of the Sky](/Book_of_the_Sky "Book of the Sky") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                       | 15                                                                                                                |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                         | 0                                                                                                                 |
| Power Cap                                                                         | 200                                                                                                               |
| Flags                                                                             | Chaotic, Helpful, Utility                                                                                         |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Lets the caster walk through the air as a raging, lightning-filled tempest. The caster's melee attacks are strengthened, electrified, and strike all adjacent foes. The caster also flies, is more evasive, gains immunity to poison and miasma, and resists electricity. They can launch themselves as a lightning bolt, blasting through everything in their way. The damage and evasion granted by storm form are highly dependent on the power with which it was cast.While transformed, any equipped weapons and armour are melded.***“Stormform is said to cause A tempest of winds and showers, Beware its powers, beware its powers. Though its coming brings the gods their night, It obliges a bloodred spren. Beware its end, beware its end.” -Brandon Sanderson, “Words of Radiance”. 2014. |

**Storm Form** is a level 7 [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations") / [Air](/Air "Air") spell that changes you into an agile, destructive being of lightning.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [2.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [3 History](#History)

## Useful Info

Storm Form turns you into lightning, with the following changes:

**Combat Bonuses**

- **Innate AC:** `10 + pow/10` AC.
- **Bonus EV:** `pow/10` bonus EV, added on top of your base EV.
- **[Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat"):** `2 + pow/3` base damage. Attacks gain [cleaving](/Cleaving "Cleaving") and the [electrocution](/Electrocution "Electrocution") brand.
- **[Blinkbolt](/Blinkbolt "Blinkbolt"):** Bolt-targeted ability that deals electric damage to everything in its path, then blinks you to the end. Has a cooldown.

**Resistances**

- [Poison immunity](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").
- [rElec](/Electricity_resistance "Electricity resistance").
- Innate [flight](/Flight "Flight").
- **[Non-living](/Non-living "Non-living"):** [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing"), lacks [blood](/Blood "Blood"), immune to [sleep](/Sleep "Sleep").
- **[Insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial"):** Immune to [constriction](/Constriction "Constriction") / [ensnarement](/Throwing_net "Throwing net"), [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"), and [petrification](/Petrification "Petrification").

**Restrictions**

- **[Melded Gear](/Transformation#Useful_Info "Transformation"):** All [armour](/Armour "Armour"), [weapon](/Weapon "Weapon") and [shield](/Shield "Shield"). (Can only wear [jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery"))
- Cannot [throw](/Throw "Throw").

Uses your [species](/Species "Species") body size. [Movement delay](/Movement_delay "Movement delay") set to 1.0, even if your [species](/Species "Species") is faster or slower.

## Strategy

Storm Form is a high damage form that scales heavily with [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power"). At low power, [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") deals more damage to single targets.

This form is surprisingly durable. You retain your natural EV, and gain bonuses to both EV and AC. Even though Dragon Form has 150% health, because it is [giant](/Size#Giant "Size"), it loses EV. When your only defensive skills are [Fighting](/Fighting "Fighting") and [Dodging](/Dodging "Dodging"), that isn't great.

### Tips & Tricks

- Like other forms, Storm Form benefits greatly from support magic such as [Ozocubu's Armour](/Ozocubu%27s_Armour "Ozocubu's Armour") and [Manifold Assault](/Manifold_Assault "Manifold Assault").
- Since Storm Form melds equipment, it's usually a good idea to wield a robe of the [Archmagi](/Archmagi "Archmagi") and/or [staff of air](/Staff_of_air "Staff of air") before transforming. Just be careful if you transform out.

| Humanoid                                                                              | Felid                                                                                    | Octopode                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Storm transform.png](/images/5/5d/Storm_transform.png)](/File:Storm_transform.png) | [![Storm form felid.png](/images/3/35/Storm_form_felid.png)](/File:Storm_form_felid.png) | [![Storm form octopode.png](/images/e/e1/Storm_form_octopode.png)](/File:Storm_form_octopode.png) |

## History

- Storm Form was replaced with the [Storm talisman](/Storm_talisman "Storm talisman") in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31").
- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), the form's base UC damage was reduced from `2 + power / 2.5` to `2 + power / 3`.
- Storm Form was added in [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), replacing [Hydra Form](/Hydra_Form "Hydra Form").

|                                   | [Transformations](/Transformation "Transformation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")  | [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") • [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form") • [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form") • [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form") • [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") • [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") • [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") • [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") • [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") |
| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") • [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form") • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Divine](/God "God")              | [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
html:
Storm Form (spell)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
 Storm Form
Level 7
School1 Air
School2 Transmutation
Source(s)

Inescapable Atlas
Book of the Sky

Casting noise 15
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 200
Flags Chaotic, Helpful, Utility
Lets the caster walk through the air as a raging, lightning-filled tempest. The caster's melee attacks are strengthened, electrified, and strike all adjacent foes. The caster also flies, is more evasive, gains immunity to poison and miasma, and resists electricity. They can launch themselves as a lightning bolt, blasting through everything in their way. The damage and evasion granted by storm form are highly dependent on the power with which it was cast.

While transformed, any equipped weapons and armour are melded.

“Stormform is said to cause
A tempest of winds and showers,
Beware its powers, beware its powers.
Though its coming brings the gods their night,
It obliges a bloodred spren.
Beware its end, beware its end.”
-Brandon Sanderson, “Words of Radiance”. 2014.

Storm Form is a level 7 Transmutations / Air spell that changes you into an agile, destructive being of lightning.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
    • 2.1 Tips & Tricks
  • 3 History

Useful Info

Storm Form turns you into lightning, with the following changes:

Combat Bonuses

  • Innate AC: 10 + pow/10 AC.
  • Bonus EV: pow/10 bonus EV, added on top of your base EV.
  • Unarmed Combat: 2 + pow/3 base damage. Attacks gain cleaving and the electrocution brand.
  • Blinkbolt: Bolt-targeted ability that deals electric damage to everything in its path, then blinks you to the end. Has a cooldown.

Resistances

  • Poison immunity.
  • rElec.
  • Innate flight.
  • Non-living: Unbreathing, lacks blood, immune to sleep.
  • Insubstantial: Immune to constriction / ensnarement, Sticky Flame, and petrification.

Restrictions

  • Melded Gear: All armour, weapon and shield. (Can only wear jewellery)
  • Cannot throw.

Uses your species body size. Movement delay set to 1.0, even if your species is faster or slower.

Strategy

Storm Form is a high damage form that scales heavily with spell power. At low power, Dragon Form deals more damage to single targets.

This form is surprisingly durable. You retain your natural EV, and gain bonuses to both EV and AC. Even though Dragon Form has 150% health, because it is giant, it loses EV. When your only defensive skills are Fighting and Dodging, that isn't great.

Tips & Tricks

  • Like other forms, Storm Form benefits greatly from support magic such as Ozocubu's Armour and Manifold Assault.
  • Since Storm Form melds equipment, it's usually a good idea to wield a robe of the Archmagi and/or staff of air before transforming. Just be careful if you transform out.


Humanoid Felid Octopode

History

  • Storm Form was replaced with the Storm talisman in 0.31.
  • In 0.28, the form's base UC damage was reduced from 2 + power / 2.5 to 2 + power / 3.
  • Storm Form was added in 0.27, replacing Hydra Form.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form
